LanguageData.CaravanDamselInDistress: We stumbled over a beautifully stunning and helpless girl held by {2} of {1}'s savages... could we bare the thought to leave her in their grasp?
LanguageData.CaravanDamselInDistress_Follow: Follow them silently until they make camp
LanguageData.CaravanDamselInDistress_Follow_Main: You follow up to their camp and wait till dark, they only have 1 guard which seems rather drunk and would be easy to take. How do you proceed?
LanguageData.CaravanDamselInDistress_Follow_KillAndFr: Kill the bandits in their sleep and free the girl
LanguageData.CaravanDamselInDistress_Follow_SneakFree: Sneak in and free the girl
LanguageData.CaravanDamselInDistress_Follow_KillSucce: You successfully cut their throughts without them waking up and freed the suprised and hopeful looking girl. What do you want to do with her?
Let her be on her way, she's been through enough
